product_name: Ultimate Survival Technologies Urban Rescue Tool - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Keep the Urban Rescue Tool from Ultimate Survival Technologies in your glove box for emergencies. The rugged, folding multitool includes a glass breaker, seat-belt cutter and other useful tools.
short_description: Keep the Urban Rescue Tool from Ultimate Survival Technologies in your glove box for emergencies. The rugged, folding multitool includes a glass breaker, seat-belt cutter and other useful tools.
